title: Elements Restaurant
typeOfFood: Lacto, Ovo, International, Organic, Western, Salad bar, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Fine dining hotel restaurant and bar on the beach. Offers a separate vegan/vegetarian menu with vegan items labeled plus a large salad bar with many vegan choices. Located in Bucuti and Tara Beach Resort, Aruba's adult-only beach resort.
streetAddress: LG Smith Blvd, 55B, Eagle - Manchebo Beach
